settings.title: I just placed an order, when will it ship?
settings.text: We try our best to ship items as fast as we can. Please allow 1 to 3 days production time for your order to ship out, average shipping times are 6 to 8 days for all shipments. Tracking numbers will be updated 3 to 4 days after your order has been SHIPPED. If you don't have a tracking number after 5 business please email us. For all other countries, please visit our shipping policy.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.text:
Your order's shipping confirmation and details arrive via email.

Expect longer delivery times during peak seasons. For tracking, visit our Tracking Portal with your email, zip code, or tracking number.

Tracking updates may take 24-72 hours post-shipment.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.text: You can cancel your order with no penalty as long as it is within 24-48 hours! You must cancel your order before it ships. If the item is already sent please use our easy return system to get a full refund.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.text: Shipping times vary as we do ship worldwide from different fulfillment centers based on your location. For all countries, please visit our shipping policy.

settings.title: I am not in love with my order, can it be returned?
settings.text:
We offer a 100% money-back guarantee for defective or damaged products. We give you 30 days to send it back to us for a full refund. Once we have received the product we will refund the full amount of your original purchase. Please Include all a name and order numbers on the returned parcels.

Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns on sale items or gift cards.

Please note: If your package is on the way, you must wait for it to arrive and return it before receiving a refund.

settings.title: In case of a return, will I receive a refund on the shipping cost?
settings.text: Please note we do not accept returns for on-sale items. In the case that the item is NOT on sale. We can only partially cover return costs once the items find their way back to us.

settings.title: What if I don't like the club (our VIP section)?
settings.text:
Join our club for exclusive offers and discounts on future items:

  • Sign up via our homepage pop-up.
  • Opt-in at checkout or account creation.
  • Subscribe from the site footer.

To leave the club:

  • Use the 'opt-out' link in any club email.
  • Need help? Contact us directly for swift support.

settings.title: What if there is an issue? Can I Contact You?
settings.text: Absolutely! We are here to help you make your home beautiful! Please email us; we will be happy to assist you in any way we can. We do receive a large number of emails, If you wish to get a prompt response please attach your order number and address the problem clearly, thanks.
